body.name: 1 Pc Inflatable Seat Cushion 18.1'' x 15.7'' x 4.7'' Portable Lift Donut Pillow Height Adjustable Hemorrhoid Pillow for Tailbone Back Pain Bed Sore Home Car Chair Wheelchair Sitting, Gray
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 45 mins
features: Quality Material: made of quality flocked PVC material, this inflatable donut cushion is sturdy, comfortable, and long lasting; The material is soft to the touch and slip resistant, ensuring that you stay put while sitting on it; The cushion's material is also easy to clean and maintain, and it does not hurt your skin or cause allergies, making it a good choice for most people; Please pay attention to close the inflation valve tightly when using to avoid gas leakage

Flexible Adjustment and Multifunctional Pad: this donut pillow for bed sores is versatile and can be adjusted to fit your needs; You can inflate it to your desired level of firmness, making it good for various purposes, such as a seat cushion or wheelchair pad. ; It is ideal for people of most ages and sizes and can be applied at home, office or car

Comfortable Design: the travel seat cushion's design is thickened and widened to provide maximum comfort and support to your back and hips; It offers good cushioning and helps distribute body weight evenly, relieving pressure and reducing pain in some areas; The design can also help improve posture, avoiding slouching and backaches, and providing better spinal alignment

Suitable Size: with a size of approximately 18.1 x 15.7 x 4.7 inches/ 46 x 40 x 12 cm, the hemorrhoid pillow for sitting is compact and portable, making it easy to carry around wherever you go; You can quickly inflate it using your mouth or a pump, and it will be ready to use in a matter of minutes; When you're done using it, simply deflate it and fold it up for easy storage

Wide Application: the inflatable seat cushion for travel is suitable for most chairs and seats, including airplane, train, bus, toilet, office chairs, car seats, wheelchairs, stadium seats, and outdoor benches; It is goodfor people who spend long hours sitting down and need added comfort and support
body.description: Features: This donut seat cushion makes a good gift for your family, partners, or colleagues who suffer from discomfort while sitting. It shows that you care about them. This seat cushion is easy to clean and maintain, and you can wipe it down with a damp cloth. The cushion is portable and lightweight, making it easy to carry around whenever you need it. It is ideal for outdoor activities such as camping, hiking, or picnics, or for use in the car, office, or home. Specifications: Material: flocked PVC Color: graySize: approx. 18.1 x 15.7 x 4.7 inches/ 46 x 40 x 12 cmPackage includes: 1 x Inflatable seat cushionNotes: Manual measurement: please allow slight errors in size. The color may have a slight difference due to different screen displays. Do not overinflate it to avoid bursting. The product does not include a pump, and please confirm the size when ordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome post-surgery item!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for use after surgery in nether regions. Worked quite well! Was a little hard to inflate - blow really hard! - but stayed inflated. Washable, portable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the ticket!
reviews.reviewText: My husband recently had open heart surgery, and for the first two months he was restricted to his lift recliner. His lower back muscles and his glutes became very sore and he asked for a donut or pillow to help. This was the perfect answer. He uses it alternately behind and under himself to ease the pressure on his muscles. We can fill it up as much as needed for comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Would not hold air. My mother doesn’t even weigh over 100lb and it just kept deflating. Don’t waste your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best donut pillow I have found so far
reviews.reviewText: If you hate the feeling of being a weeble wobble on regular donuts, get this pillow!! Its wider and supports you so you don't tip over. Its fairly heavy duty and has held up to my husband's daily use (and he's a big boy) and you don't need a pump to inflate or deflate like some other brands. This is fantastic if you don't want to be carrying an inflated donut pillow, or an inflation pump through airport security or a movie theater.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Es para mi operación
